Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-7008 affecting package systemd-bootstrap for versions less than 250.3-13
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-7008 affecting package systemd-bootstrap for versions less than 250.3-13. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package systemd-bootstrap is earlier than 250.3-13, affected by CVE-2023-7008
